short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I needed a tool that would allow me to save css overrides for sites, mainly because my auto dark-mode was messing up on some sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome-extension that can inject css into a site. It can also save the css to be injected on next visits.
